DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the pharmacokinetics (PK) profile of elbasvir (MK-8742) after a single dose to participants with mild, moderate, or severe hepatic insufficiency compared with healthy controls.
DOC.brief_title: The Influence of Hepatic Insufficiency on the Pharmacokinetics of Elbasvir (MK-8742) (MK-8742-009)
